FinLocker Platform API

Comprehensive documentation for our microservices architecture

All Systems Operational

Welcome to FinLocker API Documentation

The FinLocker platform provides a comprehensive suite of microservices designed to power modern financial applications. Our API-first approach ensures scalability, reliability, and developer-friendly integration.

Quick Start

  1. Choose your microservice from the left navigation
  2. Review the service-specific documentation
  3. Implement using our provided SDKs and examples
  4. Test your integration using our sandbox environment

Available Services

Analytics Service

Comprehensive analytics and reporting capabilities for user engagement tracking and data processing.

.NET 8.0 Entity Framework Azure Service Bus

GenAI Service

Advanced AI-powered features including content generation, evaluation, and intelligent data processing.

.NET 8.0 Cosmos DB OpenAI

Analytics Service

Data Processing & Reporting

Comprehensive analytics services for the FinLocker platform

Overview

The Analytics Service provides comprehensive data processing, reporting, and user engagement tracking capabilities. It handles real-time data synchronization, generates analytics reports, and processes background jobs for optimal performance.

Key Features

  • Real-time analytics and reporting
  • Automated data processing pipelines
  • Loan officer performance metrics
  • Email campaign analytics
  • ️ Multi-source data integration

Documentation Links

View Complete Analytics Documentation →

GenAI Service

Generative AI & Machine Learning

Advanced AI-powered features for intelligent processing

Overview

The GenAI Service provides cutting-edge generative AI capabilities including content generation, intelligent evaluation, market reporting, and automated data processing using state-of-the-art machine learning models.

Key Features

  • AI-powered content generation
  • Intelligent document processing
  • Automated market analysis
  • Smart recommendation engine
  • ⚡ Real-time AI inference

Documentation Links

View Complete GenAI Documentation →

System Architecture

Learn about our microservices architecture, design patterns, and system components.

Authentication

Understand how to authenticate with our APIs using OAuth 2.0 and API keys.

SDKs & Libraries

Download and integrate our official SDKs for various programming languages.

Testing Guide

Best practices and testing strategies for integrating with FinLocker services.

Changelog

Track updates, new features, and changes across all our services.

System Status

Real-time status and performance metrics for all FinLocker services.

Contact Support

Get help from our technical support team and developer community.
